mechanicalElectricalDescription: Mechanical & Electrical (M&E) systems are essential components of modern infrastructure. We provide comprehensive design, installation, and maintenance services to support reliable building operations and long-term efficiency.
logisticWarehouseDescription: Our Logistic & Warehouse services provide comprehensive supply chain solutions with efficient inventory management, storage facilities, and distribution systems to support seamless operations.
upsReworkDescription: Our UPS Rework services ensure reliable power backup systems through expert repair, testing, and maintenance of UPS components to guarantee uninterrupted power supply.
customerSupportEngineerDescription: Our Customer Support Engineers provide technical expertise and on-site support to ensure optimal performance of all systems and equipment.
callCenterDescription: Our Call Center services provide 24/7 customer support with high professionalism, ensuring all ATM inquiries and issues are handled quickly and efficiently.
monitoringDescription: Our real-time Monitoring system provides full visibility into ATM status, enabling early detection of issues and optimization of the national ATM network performance.
ductingSystemDescription: Our Ducting System services provide comprehensive design, installation, and maintenance of HVAC ducting systems for optimal air distribution and comfort.
workshopMaintenanceLCDDescription: Our Workshop Maintenance LCD services provide expert repair and maintenance services for LCD displays and components.
cassetteReworkDescription: Our Cassette Rework services provide expert repair and refurbishment of ATM cassette modules to ensure optimal functionality.
atmModuleReworkDescription: Our ATM Module Rework services ensure reliable performance and extended lifecycle of ATM devices. With advanced repair facilities, strict quality control, and a skilled team, we provide quick and effective rework solutions for critical ATM components.
plumbingDescription: Our Plumbing services provide comprehensive installation, maintenance, and repair of plumbing systems for residential and commercial properties.
